title: When ÂŁ190m isn't enough...
text: 14:22 AyBee said: But her award is still £10m + 30% (even if that's of his share). Where's the merit in dragging it back through court because the value of the company was understated? If the value of the company was understated, she'll get more anyway... because I suspect someone is trying to do a deal to unpick this. Either him because he wants to offer a lump sum before exit) or her (because she wants a guaranteed wedge now). What will be interesting is whether this woman marries again, or just takes a succession of boyfriends. Because what's hers is hers....rich girls may bang bad boys. But they usually end up with rich boys.
